mapper.select: select apply_id, apply_number, apply_type, apply_date, apply_area, apply_ditch, apply_cards, apply_plan, apply_dateupdate, apply_name, apply_card, applu_type, apply_phone, apply_code, apply_cardtype from js_creditcard.creditcard_apply where apply_card = #{applyCard}

select apply_id, apply_number, apply_type, apply_date, apply_area, apply_ditch, apply_cards, apply_plan, apply_dateupdate, apply_name, apply_card, applu_type, apply_phone, apply_code, apply_cardtype from js_creditcard.creditcard_apply where apply_id = #{applyId}

select apply_id, apply_number, apply_type, apply_date, apply_area, apply_ditch, apply_cards, apply_plan, apply_dateupdate, apply_name, apply_card, applu_type, apply_phone, apply_code, apply_cardtype from js_creditcard.creditcard_apply where apply_name = #{applyName} and apply_card = #{applyCard}

select apply_id, apply_number, apply_type, apply_date, apply_area, apply_ditch, apply_cards, apply_plan, apply_dateupdate, apply_name, apply_card, applu_type, apply_phone, apply_code, apply_cardtype from js_creditcard.creditcard_apply limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into js_creditcard.creditcard_apply(apply_number, apply_type, apply_date, apply_area, apply_ditch, apply_cards, apply_plan, apply_dateupdate, apply_name, apply_card, applu_type, apply_phone, apply_code, apply_cardtype) values (#{applyNumber}, #{applyType}, #{applyDate}, #{applyArea}, #{applyDitch}, #{applyCards}, #{applyPlan}, #{applyDateupdate}, #{applyName}, #{applyCard}, #{appluType}, #{applyPhone}, #{applyCode}, #{applyCardtype})
mapper.update:
update js_creditcard.creditcard_apply
apply_number = #{applyNumber},
apply_type = #{applyType},
apply_date = #{applyDate},
apply_area = #{applyArea},
apply_ditch = #{applyDitch},
apply_cards = #{applyCards},
apply_plan = #{applyPlan},
apply_dateupdate = #{applyDateupdate},
apply_name = #{applyName},
apply_card = #{applyCard},
applu_type = #{appluType},
apply_phone = #{applyPhone},
apply_code = #{applyCode},
apply_cardtype = #{applyCardtype},
where apply_id = #{applyId}
